original_title: 犯された新任女教師 恋人の目の前で生徒に犯されたわたし
overview: Sakamichi Miru's first Ryou work has been lifted! Miru, who has started her dream teacher life, witnesses the scene of bullying as soon as she arrives. Because of her strong sense of justice, Miru is put to sleep by her sleeping pills and raped. A student's request that escalates to the point where her weakness is grasped and she can not resist. A strong Irama who is screwed to the back of her throat, a closed room rape that is attached to her home, and a group circle in front of her lover. "Please... please stop..." Miru's heartbreaking cry echoes through her unhelpful school.
title: The New Female Teacher Gets Violated - Her Students Have Their Way With Her Right In Front Of Her Boyfriend - Miru Sakamichi
